column4: Tesla shares fall on worries about Model 3 production rate
column5: Tesla Inc  shares slumped 5 percent on Monday as investors awaited production numbers for the closely watched Model 3  a cheaper vehicle that analysts see as crucial to the luxury electric automaker's long-term profitability. | Video

column4: UPDATE 6-Tesla shares fall on worries about Model 3 production rate
column5: April 2 Tesla Inc shares slumped 5 percent on Monday as investors awaited production numbers for the closely watched Model 3  a cheaper vehicle that analysts see as crucial to the luxury electric automaker's long-term profitability.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla Spokesperson Says Model 3 Production Is "Highest Priority"  So Elon Musk Is Focusing Time There While Doug Field Focuses On Vehicle Engineering

column4: Tesla making 2 000 Model 3s per week: report
column5: Tesla Inc  will fall short of its 2 500 per week target for production of the crucial Model 3 sedan when it reports its numbers this week  according to a report by tech website Jalopnik  citing an email from Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk to employees.

April 2 Tesla Inc will fall short of its 2 500 per week target for production of the crucial Model 3 sedan when it reports its numbers this week  according to a report by tech website Jalopnik  citing an email from Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk to employees.

column4: Apple plans to replace Intel chips in Macs with its own: Bloomberg
column5: Apple Inc  is planning to use its own chips in Mac computers beginning as early as 2020  replacing processors from Intel Corp   Bloomberg reported on Monday  citing people familiar with the matter.
